item.title: Weekly #1 - Reflection and Outlook
item.description: 2022 is a crazy year. A turbulent first half comes along with a dramatic second half. Life is just crazy and unpredictable, but things have to go on. World in 2022 # Elon Musk buys Twitter # Elon Musk acquired Twitter with $440B, making Twitter his private property. Although he claimed this deal is for promoting Free speech, his reform does not seems to align with his promise.
